snippet.title: Galactic Thunderdome - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Unleash the chaos in Galactic Thunderdome, where physics-driven mayhem and frantic multiplayer battles collide for the ultimate party brawler experience! Choose from a vast selection of diverse items and unique characters, and dive into various game modes with up to 8 players in local multiplayer and up to 5 players online.

In the distant future, civilizations from across the galaxy come together for the deadliest tournament in history. Compete in dynamic, interactive arenas and bend the chaos to your will to become the Galactic Thunder Champion!

🚀 Features:

Intense physics-based combat with accurate explosions, ricochets, and collisions
10 unique characters, each with special abilities
Over 80 unique weapons with dual-wielding for 1200+ combinations
Various game modes including Free-for-All, Team Deathmatch, Treasure Hunt, Last Stand, and a single player Gauntlet! (More to come)
Local couch multiplayer for up to 8 players and online multiplayer for up to 5 players
Dynamic and interactive arenas with simulated rope dynamics, destructible terrain, wind / gas physics, and custom gravity!

💥 Out Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1219800/Galactic_Thunderdome/
🕹️ Join the Community: https://discord.gg/4AYmHMRuAJ
🔔 Subscribe for more updates!

Follow Us:
Twitter: https://x.com/pansimula
Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe! Let us know what you think about the trailer and what you're most excited for in Galactic Thunderdome!

#IndieGame #GalacticThunderdome #PhysicsBrawler #RetroGaming #IndieDev #Gaming #Trailer #GamingCommunity #MultiplayerGame #CartoonViolence #GamePhysics
